feed.title: WeKan Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for WeKan: v7.46
entry.content:
This release adds the following updates:

  • Update ukrainian translation. Thanks to novashdima.
  • Updated GitHub issue template for issue instructions to be more visible. Thanks to xet7.
  • For development, only recommend Debian 12 amd64, because Sandstorm works at Debian 12. Sandstorm does not work at Ubuntu 24.04. Thanks to xet7. Related https://github.com/sandstorm-io/sandstorm/issues/3712

and fixes the following bugs:

  • Optimize SVGs and PNGs to save 550KB. Thanks to C0rn3j.
  • Swap deprecated egrep for grep -E. Thanks to C0rn3j.
  • Remove notification while copying board. Thanks to e-gaulue.
  • Fixed loading of cards if there are more than 20 of them on one swimlane. Thanks to novashdima.
  • Devcontainer, reduce image size and other necessary changes for development. Thanks to mfilser.
  • Dockerfile production and dev same build. Thanks to mfilser.
  • Remove second created at on activities. Thanks to mfilser.
  • Fix Export CSV/TSV from Board create unhandled Exception. Thanks to Dexus.

Thanks to above GitHub users for their contributions and translators for their translations.

entry.title: New release for WeKan: v7.47
entry.content:
This release adds the following updates:

  • Update Docker base images to Ubuntu 24.04. Thanks to xet7.
  • Updated to MongoDB 6.0.15 at Snap Candidate. Thanks to MongoDB developers.
  • Updated release scripts. Thanks to xet7.

and fixes the following bugs:

  • Only show Board name edit button to BoardAdmin. Thanks to xet7.
  • Fix Edit Description button is wildly out of place. Thanks to C0rn3j and xet7.

Thanks to above GitHub users for their contributions and translators for their translations.

entry.title: New release for WeKan: v7.48
entry.content:
This release adds the following updates:

  • Updated release scripts. Thanks to xet7.
  • Add changes from wiki to docs. Part 1, Part 2. Thanks to xet7.

and fixes the following bugs:

  • Fix Admin Panel pages Organizations and Teams, where HTML Tables were broken. Thanks to Hekatomb and xet7.
  • Try to show more of title of collapsed list. Thanks to C0rn3j and xet7.
  • Allow Normal user to add new swimlane, list and label. Thanks to RyanHecht, norrig and xet7.

Thanks to above GitHub users for their contributions and translators for their translations.

entry.title: New release for WeKan: v7.49
entry.content:
This release adds the following updates:

  • WeKan new release version number from wiki to WeKan repo docs. Thanks to xet7.
  • Updated dependencies. Part 1, Part 2. Thanks to dependabot.

and fixes the following bugs:

  • Bugfix: Strikethrough inactive Teams and orginizations logic was inverted. Thanks to Hekatomb.
  • Changed back to original icon of Edit Description. Thanks to saschafoerster, C0rn3j and xet7.
  • Fill out Org and Team in adminReports. Thanks to Hekatomb.

Thanks to above GitHub users for their contributions and translators for their translations.

entry.title: New release for WeKan: v7.50
entry.content:
This release adds the following updates:

  • WeKan new release version number from wiki to WeKan repo docs. Thanks to xet7.
  • Updated dependencies. Part 1, Part 2. Thanks to dependabot.

and fixes the following bugs:

  • Bugfix: Strikethrough inactive Teams and orginizations logic was inverted. Thanks to Hekatomb.
  • Changed back to original icon of Edit Description. Thanks to saschafoerster, C0rn3j and xet7.
  • Fill out Org and Team in adminReports. Thanks to Hekatomb.

Thanks to above GitHub users for their contributions and translators for their translations.
